lead_paragraph: Addressing reporters for the first time since opting not to pursue further appeals of his four-game suspension in the "Deflategate" saga, New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady called it a personal decision and said he is trying to move on.

headline.print_headline: Brady: No Appeal 'a Personal Decision' in 'Deflategate' Saga
headline.main: Brady: No Appeal 'a Personal Decision' in 'Deflategate' Saga

snippet: Addressing reporters for the first time since opting not to pursue further appeals of his four-game suspension in the "Deflategate" saga, New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady called it a personal decision and said he is trying to move on....
